name: The Way Forward (maxben (Scintilla Games))
description:
You are the last resident of a small town called Westhope. You have made the difficult decision to leave to start a new chapter in your life. While hiking through an atmospheric landscape, you will need to shut down the last remaining functioning sections of the city, Open the gate and move forward…

Controls:

Move - W, S, A, D / Left Joystick

Camera - Mouse / Right Joystick

Run – Left Shift / Hold LB or L1

Interact – Left Click / A or X

Minimum System Requirements:

  • OS: WindowsXP SP2 or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Video card with 512MB of VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

Credits:

Thanks to Andrea Barreto, Luisana Rojas, Patrick Gogan and Evan LeBlanc for their support and Playtesting the game countless times!

Music: Chris Zabriskie

SFX: Freesound.org, Ryan Conway, Skullsmasha, Newlocknew Kyles and Themfish

Thanks for playing and don't hesitate to leave a comment below to let me know what you thought of the game!
